languages.text: "Кто-то говорит, что блюсти Лекс тяжело. Я всегда готов облегчить жизнь тем, кто слаб духом — всего-то требуется один удар булавы".
"Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my maul."
languages.original_text: "Кто-то говорит, что блюсти Лекс тяжело. Я всегда готов облегчить жизнь тем, кто слаб духом — всего-то требуется один удар булавы".

traits.locale_text: "Some say that upholding Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. it takes but one swing of my mace."
"Some say that upholding Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. it takes but one swing of my mace."
"Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my mace."
"Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my mace."
"Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my maul."
"Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my maul."

languages.text: "Einige sagen, die Wahrung des Lex wäre schwierig. Ich bin immer bereit, den Schwachen im Geiste das Leben zu erleichtern. Es bedarf nur eines Hiebes mit meinem Hammer."
languages.original_text: "Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my maul."

traits.locale_text: "Einige sagen, die Wahrung des Lex wäre schwierig. Ich bin immer bereit, den Schwachen im Geiste das Leben zu erleichtern. Es bedarf nur eines Hiebes mit meinem Hammer."

languages.text: « Certains disent que faire appliquer la Lex est trop difficile. Je me tiens toujours à disposition pour faciliter la vie des velléitaires et des indécis. Il suffit d'un bon coup de ma masse. »
languages.original_text: "Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my maul."

traits.locale_text: « Certains disent que faire appliquer la Lex est trop difficile. Je me tiens toujours à disposition pour faciliter la vie des velléitaires et des indécis. Il suffit d'un bon coup de ma masse. »

languages.text: 「レックスを守るのは難しいと言う人もいます。ですが、私はいつでも意志の弱い人たちのために道を楽にする覚悟があります。私のモールひと振りで、それは叶うんです」
languages.original_text: "Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my maul."

traits.locale_text: 「レックスを守るのは難しいと言う人もいます。ですが、私はいつでも意志の弱い人たちのために道を楽にする覚悟があります。私のモールひと振りで、それは叶うんです」

languages.text: «Dicen que cumplir la Lex es difícil. Siempre estoy dispuesto a facilitar el trabajo a los débiles de voluntad. Un mazazo resuelve el problema».
languages.original_text: "Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my maul."

traits.locale_text: «Dicen que cumplir la Lex es difícil. Siempre estoy dispuesto a facilitar el trabajo a los débiles de voluntad. Un mazazo resuelve el problema».

languages.text: “有些人说，凡事遵循帝国法典很困难。我不介意让那些意志薄弱的家伙轻松点，只要用我的战锤来上一锤就可以了。”
languages.original_text: "Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my maul."

traits.locale_text: “有些人说，凡事遵循帝国法典很困难。我不介意让那些意志薄弱的家伙轻松点，只要用我的战锤来上一锤就可以了。”

languages.text: "Kimileri Lex'e uymanın zor olduğunu söyler. Bense zayıf iradeliler için hayatı kolaylaştırmaktan yanayım. Tokmağımı şöyle bir savurmam yetiyor."
languages.original_text: "Some say that upholding the Lex is hard. I am always willing to make life easier for the weak-willed. It takes but one swing of my maul."

traits.locale_text: "Kimileri Lex'e uymanın zor olduğunu söyler. Bense zayıf iradeliler için hayatı kolaylaştırmaktan yanayım. Tokmağımı şöyle bir savurmam yetiyor."
